scriptedContentFragment.name: Arm - Communities - Homepage
scriptedContentFragment.description: Responsive button navigation for home page
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
Android

If you are developing Android apps or devices for mobile phones, tablets, etc, here is where you'll find the latest Arm technology.

中文社区

欢迎来到中文专区！这里专门提供中文的各种文档资源。

Company

Find the latest Arm news, events and employee profiles. Discuss what's on your mind with Arm Marketing and Product Managers.

Community Help

New to Arm Community? Start here to learn how to get the most out of it.

DesignStart

Hear the latest information, updates and discussion about custom SoC design with Arm IP through the easy-access DesignStart program.

Development Platforms

This group is to support software development on Arm supplied Development Platforms.

Embedded

Check out this community to discuss the trends, products and platforms that serve a range of embedded markets.

Graphics & Multimedia

Discuss, read blogs and find support material for the latest Mali tools, drivers and development platforms.

Internet of Things

Updates and discussion about custom SoC design with Arm IP through the easy-access DesignStart program.

Processors

Users of Arm processors can be all over the planet, and now they have a place to come together.

Arm Research

Latest research being conducted by Arm Research and our partners. Discover resources and information to enhance your own research.

SoC Design

Discussion on design and implementation, Artisan or other physical IP, manufacturing processes and technology challenges.

Software Tools

Offering two software development families that provide you with tools for every stage of your software development workflow.

TrustZone for
Armv8-M

Bring security to the smallest of Arm processors through hardware-enforced isolation.
